```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tswge)
```

### Basic R Commands
```{r}
data(AirPassengers)
data(lynx)

# mean
mean.air = mean(AirPassengers)
mean.air

# variance
var.air = var(AirPassengers)
var.air

# standard deviation
sd.air = sd(AirPassengers)
sd.air

# calculate (and optionally plot) sample autocorrelations
aut = acf(x=lynx, lag.max=25)
aut

# type='correlation' -> default
#     ='covariance'
#     ='partial'

# plot=TRUE -> default
```
